feed.title: Shasha Feng’s Research
feed.subtitle: Computational biophysics of macromolecules, especially membrane proteins.

entry.title: Farewell to 2018!

content.p: This is almost at the end of 2018. We are growing older, yes, you and me. :smiley:
This is such a fantastic year. I went through lots of fancinating things during this year. With the end of year approaching, I cannot wait to tell you. :hushed:

entry.summary: This is almost at the end of 2018. We are growing older, yes, you and me. :smiley:

entry.title: Welcome to Shasha’s Site!

content.p: Hi Welcome! This is the personal website by Shasha!!
Since Shasha thought she is somehow in tech, it makes sense to build the personal website via Github. People can then come to know about the research and maybe brainstorm together.
Shasha is also, in some cases, a bit talktive. Keeping a blog sounds a pretty new year gift.
The website is not well-founded yet, like RSS so far doesn’t work. Please don’t click RSS feed!

entry.summary: Hi Welcome! This is the personal website by Shasha!!
